thread.title: Berdych books spot in Stockholm quarters
thread.title_full: Berdych books spot in Stockholm quarters

author: AAP
title: Berdych books spot in Stockholm quarters
text:
Berdych books spot in Stockholm quarters Posted by AAP + on 23/10/2015 at 8:20 am   Berdych books spot in Stockholm quarters 
Top-seeded Tomas Berdych will face Grigor Dimitrov in the quarter-finals of the Stockholm Open, in a rematch of last year’s final. 
Berdych beat unseeded German Alexander Zverev 6-3 6-4 on Thursday, while the fifth-seeded Dimitrov saw off Nicolas Almagro of Spain, 6-4 6-4. 
Second-seeded Richard Gasquet advanced to the last eight after Steve Darcis was forced to retire with a left ankle injury during their second-round match. 
Gasquet was leading 6-1 2-0 at the time. 
Darcis is expected to feature for Belgium in the Davis Cup final against Britain next month. 
Gasquet will face fellow Frenchman Jeremy Chardy, after he beat unseeded Federico Delbonis of Argentina 6-3 7-6 (2).
